eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily

Class EF_BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents<E extends EF_ConditionalDistribution>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily.EF_Distribution
      • eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily.EF_ConditionalDistribution
        • eu.amidst.core.exponentialfamily.EF_BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EF_BaseDistribution_MultinomialParents<E extends EF_ConditionalDistribution>
extends EF_ConditionalDistribution
    This class defines conditional distributions with a set of multinomial parents. It aims to exploit some underlying structure when representing them in exponential family.

    For further details about how these models are considered in this toolbox look at the following paper

    Representation, Inference and Learning of Bayesian Networks as Conjugate Exponential Family Models. Technical Report. (pdf)

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • toExtendedLearningDistribution

        public List<EF_ConditionalDistribution> toExtendedLearningDistribution(ParameterVariables parameters,
                                                                       String nameSuffix)
        Converts this EF_ConditionalDistribution to an extended learning distribution. This new extended conditional distribution is a part of an extended Bayesian network, which is the result of adding extra variables modelling the Bayesian prior probabilities for each of the parameters of the distribution. This method can be then seen as a part of the model pre-processing for performing Bayesian learning.

        For example, if applied to a Multinomial distribution, this method will return a new conditional distribution with a Dirichlet parent variable and an unconditional Dirichlet distribution. If applied to a Normal distribution, it will return a new conditional distribution with Normal and Gamma parent variables and the associated Normal and Gamma unconditional distributions.

        Overrides:
        toExtendedLearningDistribution in class EF_Distribution
        Parameters:
        parameters - a ParameterVariables object which allow to access to all the parameter prior variables of the newly created model.
        nameSuffix - an string variable
        Returns:
        a non-empty List of EF_ConditionalDistribution objects.

      • toConditionalDistribution

        public <E extends ConditionalDistribution> E toConditionalDistribution()
        Converts this EF_ConditionalDistribution to its equivalent ConditionalDistribution object.

        Returns:

      • toConditionalDistribution

        public ConditionalDistribution toConditionalDistribution(Map<Variable,Vector> expectedValueParameterVariables)
        Converts this EF_ConditionalDistribution to a ConditionalDistribution object given a map of expected values. It assumes that the distribution is conditioned to parameter variables, thus its values are replaced with the given expected values.
        Overrides:
        toConditionalDistribution in class EF_ConditionalDistribution
        Parameters:
        expectedValueParameterVariables - a Map object that maps Variable to their corresponding expected values, i.e. Vectors.
        Returns:
        a ConditionalDistribution object.
